description.message: Receive information of a domain directly in the browser when browsing a website.

domain_unknown.message: No data could be found for the requested page. It is probable that this is a local or invalid domain.

local_ressource.message: The requested document was obtained from the local computer.

multi_domain.message: Domain refers to multiple IP addresses.

options_companymanaged_fill.message: Settings of this extension can be managed by $company$. If you have any questions, please contact $support$.

options_companymanaged.message: Settings of this extension are managed by your organization.

options_yourversion.message: You are using uDomainFlag $version$ with extension ID $extensionid$.

options_crashreports_why.message: Crash reports help in the detection and correction of errors and improve the stability of uDomainFlag. No personal data is collected or transmitted.

options_secureconnection.message: Your connection to $hostname$ is secured using $protocol$ ($cipher$).

options_secureconnection_failed.message: Your connection to $hostname$ failed. The full functionality of uDomainFlag is not available.

options_howitworks.message: Do you want to know how uDomainFlag works in detail? Find out below

options_help_translate.message: Help us translate uDomainFlag into your language at:

offline_description.message:
The server $hostname$ could not be reached or returned an incorrect answer.
Please try again later.

offline_companymanaged.message: uDomainFlag is currently managed by your company. There may be a configuration problem.
